title: Baroness Warsi – 2013 Speech to the UN Security Council
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Baroness Warsi to members of the the UN Security Council at Lancaster House in London on 11th February 2013.
content:
[![baronesswarsi](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/baronesswarsi.jpg)](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/baronesswarsi.jpg)

I want to thank their representatives here tonight for the excellent collaboration we have enjoyed over the past two years – without which the Council would have been unable to respond effectively to international crises, not least the huge changes we have seen across the Middle East and North Africa.
